title: NuGet restore command on .NET Core which supports contentFiles
body:
Right now we are using NuGet.exe which runs on the full framework for Windows, and `dnu` on Linux since we've had reliability issues running NuGet on Mono (@ValMenn correct me if I'm wrong).

We are going to take advantage of NuGet's new contentFiles support.  So we will either need an updated version of `dnu` with this functionality, or a way to run the NuGet restore command on .NET Core.

nodes.body: We will probably use the [.NET CLI](https://github.com/dotnet/cli) for this.  It still needs to be updated to support contentFiles in NuGet packages.
